Title: Detroit Street Filling Station

Menu.items:
DETROIT STREET FILLING STATION

300 Detroit St. 734-224-2161 * 100% vegan
Ask about our specials!

SOUP & CHILI

DETROIT ST. HEARTY CHILI cup $5® /bowl $8
Sweet potatoes, black & kidney beans, tomatillo,
butternut squash, w/ tortilla chips. GF NF, SF

SOUP DU JOUR cup $5 /bowl $8
Served with corn tortilla chips. Ask for allergens

SNACKS

BUFFALO CAULIFLOWER WINGS

Ranch dressing. Full order $14/ half order $8

NF; contains soy & gluten

SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP w/ tortilla chips $8
GF, contains soy, contains nuts (cashews)

NACHOS tortilla chips, black beans, cashew nacho
cheese, guacamole, pico de gallo $12 GF SF
contains nuts (cashews)

TATER TOTS with yum yum sauce $6

Add to any sandwich +$4 NF; contains soy & gluten

CHIK’N FRIED TOFU FINGERS with maple-
dijon & SW ranch dressings. Full order (8 pcs) $13°%/
half order (4 pcs) $8 NF; contains soy & gluten

SALADS

LUMBERJACK Salad $13 Baby greens, pickled
carrot-radish, marinated baked tofu, avocado,
tomato, kalamata olive, cucumber, red bell pepper,
red onion & walnuts with balsamic vinaigrette. GF;
contains nuts & soy; can be made NF & SF

TACO ‘BOUT IT Salad $13 Greens, cabbage,
grilled tofu, seasoned corn tortilla crumbles, pico de
gallo & avocado with cashew nacho cheese &

SW ranch. GF; contains nuts & soy. Can be NF.
CAN BE ORDERED AS A WRAP (then contains gluten, nuts & soy)

SOUTHWEST Salad $12 Cabbage, black beans,
brown rice, avocado, pico de gallo, tortilla chips, SW
ranch. GF, NF, dressing contains soy

GARDEN Salad $10 Baby greens, red pepper,
tomato, cucumber, red onion & avocado with
balsamic vinaigrette on the side. GF NF, dressing

contains soy
Add grilled tofu or grilled tempeh +$2.50

SANDWICHES & WRAPS

Served with potato chips + pickle spear or upgrade to

tots (+$4), soup, chili or a side salad for $3!

Chk’n Fried Wild Mushroom Sandwich $14°
Crispy lion’s mane mushrooms, creamy slaw, spicy
yum-yum sauce, and bread and butter pickles on a
grilled house-made Hawaiian bun.

NF; contains gluten & soy

TLT Sandwich $12 The Brinery tempeh
(marinated and grilled), with lettuce, tomato & herbed
mayo on our house-made rye. NF; contains gluten &
Soy.

*Allergen notice: Please tell us of any food allergies when ordering. While we do our best to avoid
cross-contact, we cannot 100% guarantee that an allergen will not be present in your food.

TREETOWN TEMPEH Reuben $13° Marinated
tempeh & sauerkraut by The Brinery & caramelized
onions on house-made rye bread with Russian
dressing, served with potato chips & a pickle. NF;
contains soy & gluten. Can be made GF as a SALAD.

BANH MI in exile $13° Baked tofu, pickled
carrot-radish, jalapenos & fresh cilantro with garlic
mayo on house-made peasant bread. NF; contains
gluten & soy. Can be made GF as a SALAD.

RASPBERRY BASIL Grilled Cheese $13°°
Raspberry jam, cashew cream cheese,
provolone-style cheese, fresh basil, spinach. SF:
contains nuts & gluten

THE WORLD’S GREATEST Wrap $14

Grilled tempeh, melted provolone-style cheese,
shredded cabbage, pickled carrot-radish, tomato,
grilled red onion, guacamole & garlic mayo on a
whole-wheat tortilla. NF; contains soy & gluten. Can be
made GF as a SALAD.

GRILLED QUESO Burrito $13 Cuban black
beans & corn, brown rice, pico de gallo, cashew
nacho cheese, SW ranch, guacamole, greens & red
bell pepper, whole wheat tortilla, served with tortilla
chips. Contains nuts, soy, & gluten. Can be made NF or
SF/GF as a BURRITO BOWL.

BUFFALO Wrap $13 Buffalo soy curls, baby
greens, tomato, cucumber, red onion, celery,
cabbage & homemade ranch on a wheat tortilla. NF;
contains gluten & soy. Can be made GF as a SALAD.

ENTREES

FRIED RICE w/ GENERAL TSO’S TOFU $15
Lightly fried brown rice with carrots, yellow onion,
corn, peas, scallions & sesame seeds. Substitute
cauliflower topping +$1 GF; contains soy

PAD THAI $15 Rice noodles stir-fried in a
tamarind-soy sauce with sautéed red onion, red bell
pepper & marinated tofu, with cabbage, cilantro,
peanuts & lime. GF; contains peanuts & soy

POWER UP Bowl $15 Brown rice, kale, grilled
red pepper & onion, marinated tofu, walnuts,
avocado, maple-dijon dressing.

GF; contains nuts (walnuts) & soy

BAKED GOODS

Produced by our sister location, The Lunch Room Bakery & Café
Cookies: Monster, Snickerdoodle,

Ginger Molasses, GF Fudgy $2

Fudge Brownie $3.”

Cornbread with Maple Butter $4

Ask about our rotating selection of additional baked
goods

BEVERAGE MENU

100% VEGAN

All cocktail and mocktail syrups are housemade

DETROIT STREET SWAG
Short-sleeve T $20 * Hoodie $45

BEVERAGES

Hyperion Coffee (Hot or Iced) $3

Rotating Coffee Specials (Hot or Iced) $5
Hyperion Cold Brew Coffee (12 oz.) $5
Hot Mulled Cider $6

Housemade Hot Cocoa $5

Hot Tea $3 Pitta, Chamomile, Peppermint, Almond Fruit,

Sweet & Spicy, China Gunpowder (Green), Earl Grey,
English Breakfast, Chai & Winter Magic

TeaHaus Black Iced Tea (caffeinated) $4

Detroit City Soda $3 Cola, Lemon Lime,
Ginger Ale, Lemonade, Cream Soda, Tonic

Fever Tree Ginger Beer (6.8 oz.) $3

Barritt’s Sugar Free Ginger Beer (12 0z.) $4
Housemade Chai Bubble Tea $6

Housemade Lavender London Fog $6 “7 $5"
Housemade Horchata $6

House Arnold Palmer $5 TeaHaus’ English
Breakfast black iced tea and lemonade

Boochy Mama’s Kombucha (12 oz.) $5
Rotating flavors - ask server

Cultured Kombucha (16 02.) $6
Rotating flavors - ask server

MOCKTAILS

House Lemonade $5 Your choice of housemade
syrup (ask server for options), lemon juice, soda or flat
water

Fruit Sparkler Soda $5 Your choice of housemade
syrup (ask server for options), soda water

Shirley Temple $5 Lemon-lime soda, grenadine,
maraschino cherries (no HFCS or Red Dye 40)
Sunnyside $6 Orange juice, cardamom syrup,
lemon juice, soda water

Sandman $6 Pomegranate juice, grenadine, tart
cherry juice, lemon juice, soda water

Harvest Bash $6 Orange juice, local apple cider,
cranberry juice, ginger syrup, lime juice

N/A Apple Cran Mule $6 Local apple cider,
cranberry juice, Fever Tree Ginger Beer, lime juice
N/A Rosemary Grapefruit Margarita $6 Grapefruit
juice, rosemary syrup, lime juice, agave, soda water
N/A Ginger Toddy $5 Minced ginger, lemon juice,
ginger syrup, hot water, cinnamon stick

Chardonnay Girasole 11/28
Pinot Grigio Il Colle 9/23

Pinot Noir The Pinot Project 11/28
Cabernet Sauvignon Lone Birch 11/28
—---------- Sparkling—-------------

Brut Methode Domaine Laurier (187mL) 10
Brut Prestige Charles Lafitte (750 mL) 30

COCKTAILS

Spiked Lemonade $9 Vodka, lemon juice,
your choice of housemade syrup (ask server for
options), sparkling or flat water

Apple Cran Moscow Mule $10 Vodka, local
apple cider, cranberry juice, lime juice, ginger beer
Rosemary Grapefruit Margarita $12 Tequila
reposado, grapefruit juice, rosemary syrup, lime
juice

Cynar Negroni $12 Gin, Cynar aperitif, sweet
vermouth, expressed orange swath

Devil’s Marg $12 House-infused habafiero
tequila, lime juice, triple sec, agave

Cold Brew Martini $12 Vodka, Tia Maria
coffee liqueur, Hyperion cold brew coffee
Stargazer $10 Aperol, passion fruit nectar, Left
Foot Charley Cinnamon Girl Hard Cider

Velvet Ropes $13 Mezcal, grenadine, lime
juice, Angostura bitters

Ginger Toddy $9 Whiskey, minced ginger,
lemon juice, ginger syrup, hot water, cinnamon
stick

Spiked Horchata $11 House-made horchata,
dark rum, amaretto

Spiked Mulled Cider $11 Mulled local apple
cider spiked with your choice of liquor/liqueur

Spiked Hot Cocoa $10 House-made hot
cocoa spiked with your choice of liquor/liqueur
*Add vegan marshmallows for $1

Spiked Coffee $9 Hyperion coffee spiked with
your choice of liquor/liqueur

Highballs $8 Your choice of liquor with your
choice of mixer

BEER & CIDER (*16 oz. Draft)

*Arbor Classic Blonde (4.5%) Arbor Brewing Co. $8
*51K IPA (7%) Blackrocks Brewery $8

*Eliot Ness Amber (6.1%) Great Lakes Brewing $8
*Flying Machine Hazy IPA (5.5%) Ore Dock $8
“Bellaire Brown (7%) Short’s Brewing $8
*Cinnamon Girl Cider (5.2%) Left Foot Charley $9
Citra Pale Ale (5.8%) Odd Side Ales $6

Gen Pop Pilsner (4.5%) Dark Horse Brewing $6
Oberon Eclipse Wheat (6.3%) Bell’s $6

Soft Parade Fruit Beer (7.5%) Short’s Brewing $6
Edmund Fitzgerald Porter (6%) Great Lakes $6
Mayan Mocha Stout (6%) Odd Side Ales $7

Pulsar Dry Cider (GF, 6.4%) Starcut Ciders $6
Hard Kombucha (rotating, 8%+) Unity Vibration $9
Run Wild IPA NON-ALCOHOLIC Athletic Brewing $5

Ask your server about our rotating selection of specials

and seasonal offerings!

Description: Casual cafe with art-lined walls serving creative comfort fare, plenty of vegan dishes & cocktails.

summary.snippet: "We ordered the Best Wrap, fried tofu, spinach and artichoke dip and a salad."
"Super friendly staff, great-tasting dishes, and nice indoor and outdoor seating!"
"Excellent food, great portions, amazing service, and serene atmosphere."

most_relevant.description:
It is a cute place decorated with lots of art and plants. We are vegetarians and had been wanting to try this place since a long time! We went basis the reviews and it did not disappoint!
We ordered
1. Buffalo Cauliflower Wings - This is a must try!
2. Spinach Artichoke Dip - The dip is amazing!  We ordered it again.
3. Chk'n Fried Wild Mushroom Sandwich - Mushrooms were a great filler!
4. The World's Greatest Wrap - The name says it all!
5. Pad Thai - It was good but the other items we tried were even better!

The server was very friendly and was always ready to clarify our doubts. The service was fairly quick too.

Lot more options to try from! We would definitely go again!

Lovely mid-September late lunch at the 100% vegan street side cafe.  Waiter recommended a customer favorite - the Reuben - which was delicious, especially the sauerkraut!  He also brought me a complimentary sampler cup of Chana masala soup since it was my first time there.  I could have had more - also delicious.  Highly recommend and will come back!  Lots of gluten free options too.

Lovely restaurant located on a corner. Street seating as well as open air seating (indoor too).
Ordering can be done on the phone via qr code or in person with server.
Staff is very attentive and are knowledgeable in menu items.
Many items can be modified to your liking or dietary. Love that they ask if need be gf, soy, nut free.
The food was very tasty and appealing looking. The portion sizes are definitely enough.
Overall, loved this restaurant,  the staff, the vibe, and the food. Would come again.
Awesome spot for vegan food. Menu is 100% plant based. I’ve got a weak spot for a vegan Reuben (this one is tempeh Reuben) and the one here did not disappoint!

I literally wish I could have ordered everything on the menu. Every plate I saw on every person's table looked absolutely delicious!!!! Staff was all super helpful, friendly and kind. The items I *did* order were very yummy. I got the gazpacho soup and raspberry basil cashew grilled cheese. So freaking good!!!

All the dishes we tried so far have been flavorful and the portion sizes were very filling for the price. Easy way to order on the QR code and reasonably efficient service. Nice environment to hangout. Hope they can stay open until later in the evening in the future.
So good my meat-eating friend gave it 4.5/5 stars. The buffalo cauliflower app and "the greatest wrap" were especially good; the fun tots were just ok. Super cute ambiance too!

You don’t even need to be vegan to love this place. Simply delicious food with a perfect light & airy ambiance adorned with interesting plants and art. My Taco ‘Bout It Salad was exceptional and my son throughly enjoyed his Grilled Queso Burrito. Our server was wonderful. Thank you Detroit Street Filling Station for creating such a splendid eatery for everyone (vegans and all!) Can’t wait to return
